name: TwitterLikeRetweetVerification
description: Verifies if a user has liked and retweeted Apex Fusion posts

parameters.name: bearerToken
parameters.description: The Twitter API Bearer Token used to authenticate requests.

parameters.name: apexTwitterId
parameters.description: The Twitter user ID of the account whose tweets are expected to be retweeted.

parameters.name: userTwitterId
parameters.description: The Twitter user ID of the user whose tweets are being checked for engagement.

parameters.name: noPosts
parameters.description: The minimum number of tweets (from the specified account) that must have been retweeted by the user.
